none:
Originally ripped by Terminal Escape, posted on August 10, 2024 Description from Terminal Escape:
 It's been a while since SICK LLAMA stopped by an blew out our ear holes, so please enjoy Shadow's Tower at maximum volume on this lovely August Saturday, and know that if you are reading these words then there are approximately five billion humans on earth who are probably worse off than you are. Maybe not - I'm just playing the odds here. SHADOW'S TOWER
